# Compiled class files
*.class

# Log files
*.log

# BlueJ files
*.ctxt

# Mobile Tools for Java (J2ME)
.mtj.tmp/

# Package files
*.jar
*.war
*.ear

# Eclipse
.project
.classpath
.settings/
.target/

# IntelliJ
.idea/
*.iml
*.iws
out/

# NetBeans
nbproject/private/
build/
nbbuild/
dist/
nbdist/
.nb-gradle/

# VS Code
.vscode/

# Maven
target/
dependency-reduced-pom.xml
buildNumber.properties
.mvn/timing.properties

# Gradle
.gradle/
build/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Environment or IDE-specific
.env
*.env

# Google Service Account
src/main/resources/credentials.json

# Local test data
*.sqlite
*.db
*.h2.db

# Node.js (if frontend or hybrid)
node_modules/

# Logs
*.log
logs/
*.pid

# Others
*.swp
*.swo
backend/micro-event/src/main/resources/credentials.json
